name: SwampTown
description:
SwampTown takes you down a dark road, fraught with danger and plagued with friendship. It was created by Tim Lange in his project, Tim'sQuest. It serves to demonstrate game design and programming principles under extreme time constraints (10 work days + post production).  The inspiration for both game and setting came from the song Shia Lebeouf by Rob Cantor.

If you are interested in more games or updates, then feel free to follow Tim at #timsquest on Instagram.
